wikipedia_page.main: Ernie Morley  ((1901-09-11)11 September 1901 – ) was a Welsh international footballer defender. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1925 and 1929, playing 4 matches. He played his first match on 28  February 1925 against England and his last match on 2 February 1929 against Ireland. At club level, he played for Swansea Town between 1924 and 1925.
